body_html: The performance regression was for small matrices (5 x 5). When I tried benchmarking CPU and CUDA batch inverse of batch size 2 x 3 x 4 with an individual matrix size of 100 x 100, there was a 10x 1.5x speedup.
body_text: The performance regression was for small matrices (5 x 5). When I tried benchmarking CPU and CUDA batch inverse of batch size 2 x 3 x 4 with an individual matrix size of 100 x 100, there was a 10x 1.5x speedup.
body: The performance regression was for small matrices (5 x 5). When I tried benchmarking CPU and CUDA batch inverse of batch size 2 x 3 x 4 with an individual matrix size of 100 x 100, there was a ~10x~ 1.5x speedup.
